ref: 8257 puṇḍari (in cmpd.) ʻ lotus ʼ TS., puṇḍarin -- m. ʻ Hibiscus mutabilis ʼ, puṇḍārīyaka -- n. ʻ its flowers ʼ, puṇḍarya -- n. ʻ a medicinal plant for sore eyes ʼ lex. [Conn. puṇḍra -- 1, puṇḍárīka -- and poss. puṭakínī -- ]

H. pũḍrī, pũḍariyā m. ʻ a medicinal plant the juice of which is used for diseased eyes ʼ, cf. paniṛī f. ʻ id. ʼ.
